thread.title: Jared Kushner’s Ties to Banks Under Scrutiny

author: Emily Glazer
title: Jared Kushner’s Ties to Banks Under Scrutiny

organizations.name: new york state of department of financial services

text:
The New York State of Department of Financial Services asked several banks for information about their relationships with Jared Kushner and his finances, people familiar with the information requests said.
The DFS, which regulates New York banks and some international banks that do business in the state, sent inquiries last week to firms that include Deutsche Bank AG and Signature Bank, these people said. Mr. Kushner is President Donald Trump’s son-in-law and a senior adviser to the president.
...
